A DTO that encapsulates device filtering options and their associated counts, used for providing filter metadata in device search and listing operations.

## Key Components

- **DeviceFilterResponse** - Main response class containing all available filter options
- **statuses** - List of device status filters with counts
- **deviceTypes** - List of device type filters with counts  
- **osTypes** - List of operating system type filters with counts
- **organizationIds** - List of organization ID filters with counts
- **tags** - List of tag-based filters with counts
- **filteredCount** - Total number of devices matching current filters

## Usage Example

```java
// Building a device filter response
DeviceFilterResponse response = DeviceFilterResponse.builder()
    .statuses(List.of(new DeviceFilterItem("ACTIVE", 25)))
    .deviceTypes(List.of(new DeviceFilterItem("MOBILE", 15)))
    .osTypes(List.of(new DeviceFilterItem("ANDROID", 12)))
    .organizationIds(List.of(new DeviceFilterItem("org-123", 8)))
    .tags(List.of(new TagFilterItem("production", 20)))
    .filteredCount(45)
    .build();

// Accessing filter data
List<DeviceFilterItem> availableStatuses = response.getStatuses();
Integer totalDevices = response.getFilteredCount();
```

The class uses Lombok annotations for boilerplate code reduction and Swagger annotations for API documentation generation.
